Make a Payment

Make a Payment
==============

Online Payment Information
--------------------------

The City of Palouse has partnered with Certified Payments, a leader in electronic payment processing for government, to provide credit and debit payments for all fees and services offered by the City.

As a result of the partnership, citizens and visitors can now make payments online and at City Hall for their utility bills, permits, City work orders, and more. The City has negotiated a lower service fee rate of 2.5%, and is accepting all major card brands including American Express, saving citizens money while providing secure, convenient payment options.

To pay online, go to payment section below or pay in-person at City Hall.

Certified Payments is a payment processor dedicated to government organizations and their citizens. With more than 25 years of experience, they deliver that dedication through their proprietary and secure payment acceptance platform, backed by award-winning support to meet the unique needs of government entities and their constituents.

For more information, please contact City Hall at [509-878-1811](http://509-878-1811).

Make A Payment
--------------

The City of Palouse accepts credit or debit card payments. There is a service fee of 2.5% ($1.00 minimum) for all credit/debit card payments online and in-person. If you have any questions, please contact City Hall at [(509)878-1811](http://(509)878-1811). Thank you.

Pay My   
Water/ Sewer Bill

[Pay Bill](https://www.certifiedpayments.net/?BureauCode=5993687&PrivateLabelCode=City%20of%20Palouse)

#### You will need your **account #** (found on your bill).

Purchase Annual   
Compost Permit

[Buy Permit](https://www.certifiedpayments.net/?BureauCode=1807460&PrivateLabelCode=City%20of%20Palouse)

#### 2024 Compost Permits are $25

Compost permits are good January 1 – December 31.  
 ***Permits are for leaves, grass, and soft vegetation only.***  
Permit will be mailed upon receipt.

Pay My   
Work Order

[Pay Work Order](https://www.certifiedpayments.net/?BureauCode=2407600&PrivateLabelCode=City%20of%20Palouse)

Look Up My Certified  
 Payments History

[Lookup Payments](https://www.certifiedpayments.net/?BureauCode=5993687&PrivateLabelCode=City%20of%20Palouse)

Comments are closed.

### Find Us

### Palouse City Hall

East 120 Main Street  
P.O Box 248  
Palouse, WA 99161

**City Hall Hours:**  
Monday through Friday,  
9:00 am to 4:00 pm
